labels.name: story
labels.value: User navigates from Insider homepage to QA job apply form

name: Full journey: Home → Careers → QA Careers → Lever QA listing → Job Detail → Apply form

description:
### 🧪 E2E – QA Hiring Journey (Istanbul, Turkiye)

Steps:
1. Open Insider home page.
2. Scroll to footer COMPANY section and click **We're hiring**.
3. On Careers page, verify Locations / Teams / Life at Insider sections are visible.
4. Navigate to QA Careers and click **See all QA jobs**.
5. On Lever, verify URL, filters, and team = Quality Assurance.
6. Filter by Location = Istanbul, Turkiye.
7. Validate first job card (title, location, Remote work type, Apply button).
8. Click **Apply** → verify job detail header.
9. Click **Apply for this job** → verify apply page header + 'Submit your application' form.

steps.name: Open Insider home page & verify header / COMPANY section
Open Insider home page
Wait for home page to be loaded (header visible)
Check if COMPANY section heading is visible in footer
Scroll to COMPANY footer and click 'We're hiring'
Scroll to COMPANY section in the footer
Verify all link texts under COMPANY section
Click "We're hiring" link under COMPANY section
Verify core sections on Careers page (Locations / Teams / Life at Insider)
Wait for 'Life at Insider One' section to be visible
Check Locations section is visible on Careers page
Check Teams section is visible on Careers page
Check 'Life at Insider One' section is visible on Careers page
Navigate to QA careers page and click 'See all QA jobs'
Open Quality Assurance careers page directly
Wait for QA careers page hero to be visible
Click 'See all QA jobs' on QA careers page
Switch to Lever QA jobs tab (if it opened in a new window)
On Lever QA jobs page verify filters / team
